scenes.description: Hiodoshi Ao and Ichijou Ririka performing the song 'LAKI MODE' on stage.
Transition scene with ReGLOSS members interacting with the crowd and introducing the next song.
Todoroki Hajime and Juufuutei Raden performing 'SUPER DUPER' (Hajime & Raden version).
MC section where Otonose Kanade takes the lead to hype up the audience for the final song.
All five members of ReGLOSS performing 'Oki Doki' together.

subtitles.original: 止めて煽いだ雲の上
subtitles.english: Stop it, above the fanned clouds

subtitles.original: 目の端に包まれたの星待って
subtitles.english: Wait for the stars wrapped in the corner of the eye

subtitles.original: ねえ、空起きた光に跨って
subtitles.english: Hey, riding on the light that just woke up in the sky

subtitles.original: 一緒に冬光交わそう
subtitles.english: Let's exchange winter lights together

subtitles.original: 留守か無しの星たちが気気としてステップ刻んで
subtitles.english: The stars, here or not, carve out steps as they please

subtitles.original: わがもの顔でなびくアイソレーション暮れきめカプセデッド
subtitles.english: Isolation fluttering with a self-important face, twilight-colored capsule...

subtitles.original: 冴えない夢にはおあいそ
subtitles.english: To the dull dreams, a polite smile

subtitles.original: 花咲く笑顔に似合いそ
subtitles.english: Suits the blooming smile

subtitles.original: 色なす全てのパレスを踊ろよ
subtitles.english: Let's dance in all the colorful palaces

subtitles.original: Under the starlight
subtitles.english: Under the starlight

subtitles.original: 流れに身を委ねて　ただ漂うだけのハートビート
subtitles.english: Surrendering to the flow, a heartbeat that just drifts along

subtitles.original: 君だけのプレイリスト　Mind flow 耳元まで運ぶよ
subtitles.english: A playlist just for you, Mind flow, I'll deliver it to your ears

subtitles.original: ドンピシャなエモーション
subtitles.english: A perfect emotion

subtitles.original: ドンピシャなラキーモード
subtitles.english: A perfect Laki Mode

subtitles.original: 闇を照らすオーロラ　言葉選ず踊り場
subtitles.english: Aurora lighting up the darkness, a dance floor without the need for words

subtitles.original: 踊っていたいずっと　またとないこの日を
subtitles.english: I want to keep dancing forever, this unique day

subtitles.original: 降り注ぐプラズマ　君がエレバプラスワン
subtitles.english: Showering plasma, if you choose, plus one

subtitles.original: 色濃く写そう　ビビッドなハイライト
subtitles.english: Let's project it vividly, vivid highlights

subtitles.original: やみつきになれダンスダンス　ハイになるまでアイスアイス
subtitles.english: Get addicted, dance dance, until you're high, ice ice

subtitles.original: 寝ても覚めても　華やぐトワイライト
subtitles.english: Awake or asleep, the brilliant twilight

subtitles.original: 煌めいたらナイスナイス
subtitles.english: If it sparkles, nice nice

subtitles.original: もっと光合図アイスアイス
subtitles.english: More, light signals, ice ice

subtitles.original: ありがとうございましたー！
subtitles.english: Thank you very much!

subtitles.original: 次の曲は…！
subtitles.english: The next song is...!

subtitles.original: SUPER DUPER!
subtitles.english: SUPER DUPER!

subtitles.original: はじめとらでんバージョン feat. 尾丸ポルカ＆宝鐘マリン！
subtitles.english: Hajime & Raden version feat. Omaru Polka & Houshou Marine!

subtitles.original: 行くぞー！
subtitles.english: Let's go!

subtitles.original: ざらついた胸の奥　愛してやまないもの　疑うことも知らないまま
subtitles.english: Deep in my roughened heart, things I love endlessly, still without knowing how to doubt

subtitles.original: そう　遂げる覚悟はできてるよ
subtitles.english: Yes, I'm prepared to see it through to the end

subtitles.original: ギミダ　ギミダビライナ
subtitles.english: Give me the, give me the be right now

subtitles.original: SUPER DUPER お口のシャングリラ　惹かれるまで踊ろうよ
subtitles.english: SUPER DUPER, Shangri-La for the ears, let's dance until we're drawn in

subtitles.original: 誰が何と言おうと　気にしないリミッター解除
subtitles.english: No matter what anyone says, I don't care, limiter released

subtitles.original: 想うだけの自由だけ
subtitles.english: Only the freedom to think

subtitles.original: 美しい声を響かせて
subtitles.english: Let those beautiful voices ring out

subtitles.original: Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, ah ah
subtitles.english: Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, ah ah

subtitles.original: 俯いた世界を　変えてみせよう
subtitles.english: Let's change this downcast world

subtitles.original: Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, SUPER DUPER
subtitles.english: Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, SUPER DUPER

subtitles.original: 一喜一憂も
subtitles.english: Joy and sorrow

subtitles.original: 一期一会も注いで
subtitles.english: Pouring into once-in-a-lifetime encounters too

subtitles.original: 一進一退でいて
subtitles.english: Stay in a state of ebb and flow

subtitles.original: こよなく恋したメロディーと
subtitles.english: With the melody I loved so dearly

subtitles.original: 会えなくて放したレプリカ
subtitles.english: And the replica I let go because we couldn't meet

subtitles.original: 名もなき君との境界線を越え　リプレイ
subtitles.english: Cross the boundary with nameless you, replay

subtitles.original: SUPER DUPER お口のシャングリラ　惹かれるまで踊ろうよ
subtitles.english: SUPER DUPER, Shangri-La for the ears, let's dance until we're drawn in

subtitles.original: 誰が何と言おうと　気にしないリミッター解除
subtitles.english: No matter what anyone says, I don't care, limiter released

subtitles.original: 想うだけの自由だけ
subtitles.english: Only the freedom to think

subtitles.original: 美しい声を響かせて
subtitles.english: Let those beautiful voices ring out

subtitles.original: Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, ah ah
subtitles.english: Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, ah ah

subtitles.original: 俯いた世界を　変えてみせよう
subtitles.english: Let's change this downcast world

subtitles.original: Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, SUPER DUPER
subtitles.english: Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, SUPER DUPER

subtitles.original: ありがとう！
subtitles.english: Thank you!

subtitles.original: イェーイ！最高だよー！
subtitles.english: Yay! That was awesome!

subtitles.original: 次の曲は…！
subtitles.english: The next song is...!

subtitles.original: この曲ってことは、盛り上がって行く準備はできてるよな！
subtitles.english: Since it's this song, you're all ready to get pumped up, right!

subtitles.original: イェーイ！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: 行くよー！
subtitles.english: Here we go!

subtitles.original: OK! DOKI! 史上最高アレバイズ
subtitles.english: OK! DOKI! The best ever Arise

subtitles.original: EASY! BREEZY! 歌い鳴らせばフェイバリット
subtitles.english: EASY! BREEZY! If you sing it out, it's a favorite

subtitles.original: OK! DOKI! このままいたいダイアローグ
subtitles.english: OK! DOKI! A dialogue that wants to stay like this

subtitles.original: EASY! BREEZY! 踊ろうよ　Everybody
subtitles.english: EASY! BREEZY! Let's dance, everybody

subtitles.original: それぞれ異なった勝ち誇るマイナスをプラスになり待ち
subtitles.english: Each different triumphant minus waiting to become a plus

subtitles.original: 笑えば不敵やって勝ち核算　お決まりのアイスタから始まる
subtitles.english: If we laugh, it's a fearless win-loss calculation, starting from the usual eye star

subtitles.original: 愉快な仲間気づけば　バイマイサイ
subtitles.english: Joyful friends, if I notice, they're by my side

subtitles.original: もっと話したい時バカ騒ぎ
subtitles.english: When I want to talk more, we have a blast

subtitles.original: 運命共同体　転生してゆく君のアイラック
subtitles.english: Destined community, your eye-luck that reincarnates

subtitles.original: 分かち合えるエンパシー　共に迷チャンスは
subtitles.english: Shared empathy, together the chance to get lost is...

subtitles.original: Reach the top!
subtitles.english: Reach the top!

subtitles.original: 絶対絶対絶対絶対的煌めき中
subtitles.english: Absolutely, absolutely, absolutely, absolute sparkling

subtitles.original: 今は自由気まま水色のユニバース
subtitles.english: Now it's a carefree light blue universe

subtitles.original: 塗りつぶせ真っ白に　シンクロするシノプス
subtitles.english: Paint it all white, synchronizing synops

subtitles.original: 限界突破　引きつける眼光
subtitles.english: Break through the limits, eyes that draw you in

subtitles.original: あれ？こんなところにカメラが！
subtitles.english: Oh? There's a camera here!

subtitles.original: 今、自撮り中ー！
subtitles.english: We're taking a selfie now!

subtitles.original: OK! DOKI! 史上最高アレバイズ
subtitles.english: OK! DOKI! The best ever Arise
